name: Flawless Responsive UX
description: Make vibe look perfect on all screen sizes: phones (320-768px), tablets (768-1024px), laptops (1024-1440px), and desktops (1440px+). Fix layout issues, horizontal scroll bugs, and ensure crisp text/particles on Retina displays.

stories.title: 4-Tier InputPanel Layout
stories.description: Replace the current 2-tier (mobile/desktop) responsive system with a 4-tier system. Add viewportSize state: 'mobile' (<768px), 'tablet' (768-1024px), 'laptop' (1024-1440px), 'desktop' (>1440px). Mobile stays bottom panel (100% width, 40vh max). Tablet: side panel 280px, left: 16px. Laptop: side panel 320px, left: 24px. Desktop: side panel 380px, left: 32px. All non-mobile use top: 50%, transform: translateY(-50%) for vertical centering.
stories.verify: Panel width and position adapts smoothly across all breakpoints

stories.title: Remove CSS 100vw Bug
stories.description: Remove the problematic '* { max-width: 100vw; }' rule from index.css (around lines 44-47). This causes horizontal scrollbar issues on macOS when scrollbars are visible. Delete these lines entirely.
stories.verify: No horizontal scroll on any device, especially macOS

stories.title: Add CSS Breakpoints
stories.description: Add new media queries to index.css: (1) @media (min-width: 769px) and (max-width: 1023px) for tablets, (2) @media (min-width: 1024px) and (max-width: 1439px) for laptops, (3) @media (min-width: 1440px) for large desktops. These complement the existing (max-width: 768px) mobile breakpoint.
stories.verify: CSS breakpoints exist for tablet, laptop, and desktop sizes

stories.title: Better SpinWheel Font Scaling
stories.description: Update the font size formula in SpinWheel.tsx drawWheel function. Change from 'Math.min(16, radius * 0.1)' to 'Math.min(20, Math.max(12, radius * 0.12))' for better readability. This ensures minimum 12px and maximum 20px with better scaling.
stories.verify: Wheel text is readable at all viewport sizes

stories.title: DPR-Aware Confetti
stories.description: Update ResultModal.tsx ConfettiParticle to scale with devicePixelRatio. Add 'const dpr = window.devicePixelRatio || 1' and 'const particleSize = Math.round(10 * Math.min(dpr, 1.5))'. Use particleSize for width and height instead of fixed '10px'. This makes confetti visible on Retina displays.
stories.verify: Confetti particles look good on both standard and Retina displays

stories.title: Verify All Breakpoints
stories.description: Run build and lint. Manually verify layout at: 375px (iPhone), 768px (iPad), 1024px (MacBook Air), 1440px (MacBook Pro), 1920px (external monitor). Ensure no horizontal scroll, readable text, and smooth transitions between breakpoints.
stories.verify: Build passes, lint passes, all breakpoints look correct
